name: The Boring World of Niels Bohr
name_original: The Boring World of Niels Bohr
description:
Niels Bohr, famous Danish nuclear physicist, has been entangled with his alternate self! Looks like the many-worlds interpretation might be right after all... Help the two Nielses navigate the streets of Copenhagen, past Schrodinger's cats and other dangers, to try and escape this boring world!

Game made for Global Game Jam 2022 by:

  • Anton Hemlin
  • Hannes Sorensson
  • Fabian Sorensson
